signals.Ask: The AI must provide accurate responses based on uploaded training materials.
signals.Evidence: Hiver gave us this information on the right, which… was incorrect. Basically all of it was incorrect.

signals.Ask: We want a customer-facing AI experience to handle level one support cases.
signals.Evidence: Ultimately, we want a customer facing AI experience that's going to make it easier for us to eliminate… more cases at level one.

signals.Ask: Hiver must integrate seamlessly with Netsuite for case management.
signals.Evidence: We don't want to introduce another source of truth and source of record for any formal emails with customers.

signals.Ask: The AI should suggest relevant knowledge base articles during customer interactions.
signals.Evidence: I would want copilot to not just build the answer himself.

signals.Ask: We need assurance that ongoing adjustments to the AI will not be a recurring burden.
signals.Evidence: I just wonder how this looks long term or will we have to continue to, you know, meet with you guys to tweak every time we roll out a new product line.

signals.Ask: We require detailed analytics on AI interactions and case resolutions.
signals.Evidence: I would want to be able to have analytics on how many questions do we get a day, a week, a month, a quarter?
